fields.name: On/Off
fields.description: Actuator which is handled only as on or off, for example a light bulb which goes on between 6 PM and 11 PM, the rest of the time is off.

fields.name: Timed
fields.description: An actuator which can be handled as On/Off but with working periods, meaning for example: A water pump turns on every 30 minutes, works for 10 minutes and then goes off. Different from a light bulb which turns on at 7 PM and goes off at 10 PM, for example.
